Parody's like this always crack me up.  Like, the dude that's doing the cucking is often a normal ass dude and in the parody, their cucking a person that could essentially paste them with a stiff pat on the back.  Issei, depending on what point this is supposed to take place, could quite literally mist his two little buddies by sighing hard enough in their direction.  I cannot even imagine anyone of relatively normal human abilities (aside from sexual ones) even attempting to make a move on someone they know it's basically in a relationship with that person.  How out of your goddamn mind would you have to be to try and steal the girl of a dude that can reduce your entire country to dust by punching really hard?
